Rumour_text: Napoli have submitted a proposal to Jonathan David with advanced talks ongoing for a free transfer.   Important contract proposal has been sent to the striker whos set to leave Lille at the end of the season.   There are still key details to clarify with more talks to follow.

Como 1907 entra na corrida por Gabri Veiga e já apresentou uma proposta ao Al-Ahli de acordo com o jornal 'Ariyadhiah'.    Translated from Portuguese:   Como 1907 enters the dispute for Gabri Veiga and has already presented a proposal to Al-Ahli according to the newspaper 'Ariyadhiah'.

Galatasaray oferece um salário anual de 10 milhões de euros a Leroy Sané de acordo com Plettigoal.   Translated from Portuguese:   Galatasaray offers Leroy Sané an annual salary of 10 million euros according to Plettigoal.

FK Sarajevo iniciou conversações internas para contratar Asmir Begovic de acordo com o jornalista lorenzooleporee.   Translated from Portuguese:   FK Sarajevo have started internal talks to sign Asmir Begovic according to journalist lorenzooleporee.

Galatasaray have agreed to cover €9/10m as salary of Victor Osimhen until the end of the season.   Loan deal agreed with Napoli does NOT include any buy option/obligation clause.   Mission in Napoli to get Victors green light.
FC Porto are among clubs keen on signing Gabri Veiga from Al Ahli this summer.   Hes on the list and highly appreciated since January as marcosbenito9 reports.

AS Mónaco está interessado em garantir a contratação de Ansu Fati segundo o eldesmarque.   Translated from Portuguese:   AS Monaco are interested in securing the signing of Ansu Fati according to eldesmarque.

Kewin Silva desperta o interesse do Corinthians de acordo com ojogo.  O guardião de 30 anos está em final de contrato com o Moreirense.   Translated from Portuguese:   Kewin Silva has sparked interest from Corinthians according to ojogo.  The 30-year-old goalkeeper is at the end of his contract with Moreirense.
